c74object.name: the.mc.ef~
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze Â© 2020, www.xenorama.com.
A simple amplitude envelope follower with curve parameters and peak amplitude monitoring.

objarg.name: ramp-up-samples
objarg.digest: Number of samples to ramp up absolute signal value
objarg.description: INumber of samples to ramp up absolute signal value, equivalent to an envelope attack. The default is 1 sample.

objarg.name: ramp-down-samples
objarg.digest: Number of samples to ramp down absolute signal value
objarg.description: INumber of samples to ramp down absolute signal value, equivalent to an envelope decay. The default is 4000 samples.

objarg.name: makeup-gain
objarg.description: Amplify ramped delta-samples. The default is 15.

objarg.name: clipping-toplevel
objarg.description: Clip output amplitude envelope flag. The default is 1 (clip to amplitude of 1.). Any nonzero floating-point value will clip the output to that value.

objarg.name: peakamp-interval
objarg.description: Peak amplitude evaluation interval (in ms). The default is 100 ms, at this rate peak amplitude values are output from the second outlet along with the voice number from the rightmost outlet.

objarg.name: peakamp-postclip-flag
objarg.description: Evaluate peak amplitudes after clipping. The default is 1, when set to '0', peak amplitudes represent values before any clipping is applied.

attribute.name: clip
attribute.description: Clip output amplitude envelope flag. The default is 1 (clip to amplitude of 1.). Any nonzero floating-point value will clip the output to that value.

attribute.name: down
attribute.digest: Number of samples to ramp down absolute signal value
attribute.description: INumber of samples to ramp down absolute signal value, equivalent to an envelope decay. The default is 4000 samples.

attribute.name: interval
attribute.description: Peak amplitude evaluation interval (in ms). The default is 100 ms, at this rate peak amplitude values are output from the second outlet along with the voice number from the rightmost outlet.

attribute.name: makeup
attribute.description: Amplify ramped delta-samples. The default is 4.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: Set smoothing mode to either "slide" (0, default) or "rampsmooth" (1), using either a symbol or integer value

attribute.name: postclip
attribute.description: Evaluate peak amplitudes after clipping. The default is 1, when set to '0', peak amplitudes represent values before any clipping is applied.

attribute.name: up
attribute.digest: Number of samples to ramp up absolute signal value
attribute.description: INumber of samples to ramp up absolute signal value, equivalent to an envelope attack. The default is 1 sample.
